stand_out:
* Extend the favorites database to store the movie poster, synopsis, user rating, and release date, and display them even when offline.
* Implement sharing functionality to allow the user to share the first trailer’s `YouTube` URL from the movie details screen.

rubric_items.passed_description: App is written solely in the Java Programming Language.
rubric_items.criteria: App is written solely in the Java Programming Language.

rubric_items.passed_description: App conforms to common standards found in the [Android Nanodegree General Project Guidelines](http://udacity.github.io/android-nanodegree-guidelines/core.html).
rubric_items.criteria: App conforms to common standards found in the [Android Nanodegree General Project Guidelines](http://udacity.github.io/android-nanodegree-guidelines/core.html).

rubric_items.passed_description: App utilizes stable release versions of all libraries, Gradle, and Android Studio.
rubric_items.criteria: Submission must use stable release versions of all libraries, Gradle, and Android Studio. Debug/beta/canary versions are not acceptable.

rubric_items.passed_description: UI contains an element (e.g., a spinner or settings menu) to toggle the sort order of the movies by: most popular, highest rated.
rubric_items.criteria: UI contains an element (e.g., a spinner or settings menu) to toggle the sort order of the movies by: most popular, highest rated.

rubric_items.passed_description: Movies are displayed in the main layout via a grid of their corresponding movie poster thumbnails.
rubric_items.criteria: Movies are displayed in the main layout via a grid of their corresponding movie poster thumbnails.

rubric_items.passed_description: UI contains a screen for displaying the details for a selected movie.
rubric_items.criteria: UI contains a screen for displaying the details for a selected movie.

rubric_items.passed_description: Movie Details layout contains title, release date, movie poster, vote average, and plot synopsis.
rubric_items.criteria: Movie Details layout contains title, release date, movie poster, vote average, and plot synopsis.

rubric_items.passed_description: Movie Details layout contains a section for displaying trailer videos and user reviews.
rubric_items.criteria: Movie Details layout contains a section for displaying trailer videos and user reviews.

rubric_items.passed_description: When a user changes the sort criteria (most popular,  highest rated, and favorites) the main view gets updated correctly.
rubric_items.criteria: When a user changes the sort criteria (most popular,  highest rated, and favorites) the main view gets updated correctly.

rubric_items.passed_description: When a movie poster thumbnail is selected, the movie details screen is launched.
rubric_items.criteria: When a movie poster thumbnail is selected, the movie details screen is launched.

rubric_items.passed_description: When a trailer is selected, app uses an Intent to launch the trailer.
rubric_items.criteria: When a trailer is selected, app uses an Intent to launch the trailer.

rubric_items.passed_description: In the movies detail screen, a user can tap a button (for example, a star) to mark it as a Favorite. Tap the button on a favorite movie will unfavorite it.
rubric_items.criteria: In the movies detail screen, a user can tap a button (for example, a star) to mark it as a Favorite. Tap the button on a favorite movie will unfavorite it.

rubric_items.passed_description: In a background thread, app queries the `/movie/popular` or `/movie/top_rated` API for the sort criteria specified in the settings menu.
rubric_items.criteria: In a background thread, app queries the /movie/popular or /movie/top_rated API for the sort criteria specified in the settings menu.

rubric_items.passed_description: App requests for related videos for a selected movie via the `/movie/{id}/videos` endpoint in a background thread and displays those details when the user selects a movie.
rubric_items.criteria: App requests for related videos for a selected movie via the /movie/{id}/videos endpoint in a background thread and displays those details when the user selects a movie.

rubric_items.passed_description: App requests for user reviews for a selected movie via the `/movie/{id}/reviews` endpoint in a background thread and displays those details when the user selects a movie.
rubric_items.criteria: App requests for user reviews for a selected movie via the /movie/{id}/reviews endpoint in a background thread and displays those details when the user selects a movie.

rubric_items.passed_description: The titles and IDs of the user’s favorite movies are stored using Room and are updated whenever the user favorites or unfavorites a movie. No other persistence libraries are used.
rubric_items.criteria: The titles and IDs of the user’s favorite movies are stored using Room and are updated whenever the user favorites or unfavorites a movie. No other persistence libraries are used.

rubric_items.passed_description: When the "favorites" setting option is selected, the main view displays the entire favorites collection based on movie ids stored in the database.
rubric_items.criteria: When the "favorites" setting option is selected, the main view displays the entire favorites collection based on movie ids stored in the database.

rubric_items.passed_description: Database is implemented using Room. No other persistence libraries are used.
rubric_items.criteria: Database is implemented using Room. No other persistence libraries are used.

rubric_items.passed_description: Database is not re-queried unnecessarily. LiveData is used to observe changes in the database and update the UI accordingly.
rubric_items.criteria: Database is not re-queried unnecessarily. LiveData is used to observe changes in the database and update the UI accordingly.

rubric_items.passed_description: Database is not re-queried unnecessarily after rotation. Cached LiveData from ViewModel is used instead.
rubric_items.criteria: Database is not re-queried unnecessarily after rotation. Cached LiveData from ViewModel is used instead.
